TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMappedFolderCollection implements class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointCollection`1<class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolder>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolder>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged, class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 表示 SharePoint 项目中的映射文件夹的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of mapped folders in a SharePoint project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射的文件夹是 SharePoint 项目中的 SharePoint 服务器安装的某些文件的物理位置相对应的文件夹。Mapped folders are folders in a SharePoint project that correspond to the physical location of certain files in the SharePoint Server installation. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 添加和移除映射文件夹](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-and-remove-mapped-folders)。For more information, see [How to: Add and Remove Mapped Folders](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-and-remove-mapped-folders).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolder Add(valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType folderType) cil managed

param.name: folderType
param.span: 要创建的映射文件夹的类型。

span.span: The type of mapped folder to create.

summary.span: 将指定类型的映射文件夹添加到当前的 SharePoint 项目中，并将映射文件夹也添加到项目的包中。

span.span: Adds a mapped folder with the specified type to the current SharePoint project, and also adds the mapped folder to the package in the project.
The mapped folder that was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用此方法时，你可以指定任何值除外。When you use this method, you can specify any value except for .

span.span: The parameter is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolder Add(string deploymentPath) cil managed

param.name: deploymentPath
param.span: SharePoint 中映射文件夹映射到的路径。

span.span: The path in SharePoint to which the mapped folder is mapped.

param.span: 此路径相对于 SharePoint 配置单元的根目录。

span.span: This path is relative to the root of the SharePoint hive.

param.span: 如果文件夹当前不存在，则它将在部署解决方案时创建。

span.span: If the folder does not currently exist, it will be created when the solution is deployed.

summary.span: 将具有指定部署路径的映射文件夹添加到当前的 SharePoint 项目中，并将映射文件夹也添加到项目的包中。

span.span: Adds a mapped folder with the specified deployment path to the current SharePoint project, and also adds the mapped folder to the package in the project.
The mapped folder that was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用此方法创建的映射的文件夹并且指定`deploymentPath`不对应一个标准的映射的文件夹位置的值的映射文件夹的属性具有值。When you use this method to create a mapped folder and you specify a `deploymentPath` value that does not correspond to one of the standard mapped folder locations, the property of the mapped folder has the value .
